nodes.text: Rellu was an male Human Mandalorian during the Cold War that was one of Tarro Blood's followers, along with Sedyn Kyne. Rellu, Kyne, and a number of other Mandalorians met on Nar Shaddaa in order to kill Blood's rival, but their entire group was killed in the resultant firefight with the bounty hunter and Hedarr Soongh.
